problem.p: The DHIS2 Data Quality Academy contains a number of complex and advanced level concepts.
To successfully complete this course, you will need to have a good understanding of how DHIS2 works, including (but not limited to):

ul.li: How to use Data Element and Indicator Groups to find associated Data Elements and Indicators
How to navigate the Maintenance app
How to create aggregate Data Elements
How to create aggregate Data Sets
How to review descriptions of Data Elements and Indicators
How the DHIS2 category model functions
How the process of analytics works in DHIS2
Understand what a CSV file is

problem.p: In order to access the course, you will need to acknowledge that this is an advanced level course and use the drop-down box below to respond yes or no to the statement below. If you answer "Yes," you will be granted access to the remaining course material. Note: You may need to refresh this page in your browser after clicking "Submit" in order for the additional course modules to appear.

label.b: I am aware that the DHIS2 Data Quality Academy is for advanced level users, and believe I have sufficient knowledge of DHIS2 to complete the course material.
